cleaned_text: 69th Street New York, NY 10021 The Integrative Health and Wellbeing program at NewYork-Presbyterian, in collaboration with Weill Cornell Medicine, is an individualized, holistic, and evidence-based approach to healthcare. We partner with you to help you improve your physical, mental, and spiritual well-being. Our approach to your care includes: - A 45-60 minute evaluation by our dual-certified integrative medicine and internal medicine physicians - Comprehensive physical exam - Review of your medical records and laboratory testing - If needed, recommendation of additional testing - Thorough discussion and education about lifestyle management, behavioral modification, and if needed, recommendations for adjunctive therapies - If needed, referrals to recommended services: acupuncture, massage therapy, nutrition counseling, yoga instruction, mindfulness coaching, and meditation instruction. Who may benefit: We believe that all patients can improve their health. Patients with the following concerns often find our approach useful: - Oncology (new diagnosis, initiation of chemotherapy or radiation therapy, symptom relief) - Cardiology (prevention of cardiac disease, slowing of progression, stress relief, diet optimization) - GI (Irritable bowel syndrome, Inflammatory bowel disease, nonspecific GI symptoms) - Autoimmune disease - Chronic pain - Men's health - Women's health - Lifestyle optimization - Stress relief - Resilience techniques Related Articles: [Channel 11 News: Using the mind-body connection to fight Alzheimer's](https://pix11.com/2019/02/05/using-the-mind-body-connection-to-fight-alzheimers/) [Reuters: Back pain and Insurance Coverage for Non-Drug Therapies](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-health-back-pain-insurance/better-insurance-coverage-of-non-drug-therapies-might-help-ease-opioid-crisis-idUSKCN1MJ2M0) [Forbes: 10 Wellness Trends You Have To Try in 2019](https://www.forbes.com/sites/jonisweet/2019/01/04/top-10-wellness-trends-2019/#103bac275ea1) [Allure: Supplements for "Wellness"](https://www.allure.com/story/beauty-supplements-and-wellness-industry) [NYMag About Stress](https://www.everydayhealth.com/stress/guide/#commoncauses) [Annals of Internal Medicine: Efficacy of Therapies for Treatment of Depression for Patients Undergoing Maintenance Hemodialysis](https://annals.org/aim/fullarticle/2726666/comparative-efficacy-therapies-treatment-depression-patients-undergoing-maintenance-hemodialysis-randomized) Media Photos What Our Patients Are Saying [Oleg Fabrikant, DAOM, L.Ac](/oleg-fabrikant-daom-lac) [Jillian Laura Cohen, M.D.](/jillian-laura-cohen-md) Dr Cohen is attentive and efficient.
